data.message:
I love you Slim, we coulda been
together, think about it
You ruined it now, I hope you can't
sleep and you dream about it
And when you dream I hope you can't
sleep and you SCREAM about it
I hope your conscience EATS AT YOU
and you can't BREATHE without me

replies.message: that's the kinda shit that makes us not want to meet each other ,you got some issues i think you need some counseling hahaha
I am stan but u r not the "EM" lolz, so your cmnt is n't aprropirate! :D

My girlfriend's jealous cause I talk about you 24/7, but she don't know you like I know you, no one does. She don't know what it was like for people like us growing up. 

Sure the lyrics are off a bit, but my favorite part in the song.

You gotta call me man, I'll be the
biggest fan you'll ever lose
Sincerely yours, Stan -- P.S.
We should be together too
